EmailTemplate.description: Used to send ad-hoc RSVP emails when individual is added as a Campaign Member
EmailTemplate.name: Event RSVP
EmailTemplate.subject: You are invited to {!CampaignMember.Campaign}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!CampaignMember.FirstName},
As a new member and supporter of {!Organization.Name}, you are cordially invited to our {!CampaignMember.Campaign}.
To confirm attendance, please click RSVP below. We welcome you to bring additional guests.
RSVP
Thank you again for your support. We look forward to seeing you at the {!CampaignMember.Campaign}.
Best regards,
{!Organization.Name}
